name: places/ChIJuxCBi6tZwokRX4pQn3hVI4w
formattedAddress: 134 W 37th St, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 134 W 37th St, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: Buyer beware of this company’s customer service because it is horribly unprofessional and unpleasant. The customer service team works from their home. They are to say the least very nasty. They will hang up on you rather than working with you to resolve the problem. The quality of their merchandise is below average and overpriced. Purchased a nylon belt @ $100 and the finish rubbed off in less than 2 weeks and when I attempted to get an even exchange Ashlee the customer service agent lipped my spouse and hung up on her.

originalText.text:
AVOID THIS COMPANY.
ordered 4 pair of pants, none fit as described. Returned for another size, still doesn’t fit. Returned immediately.
THEN, they charged me restocking fee, tax, no shipping refund. Their inferior product cost me $42 to return them.
Complete scam.
Inferior products.
DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY.

originalText.text: Sent 2 pairs pants back for size exchange in June. It’s now August, no response. I’ve called, emailed, nothing. Horrible customer service. Not worth the risk unless you know the exact pair. Always buy these in person.

text.text: Sent 2 pairs pants back for size exchange in June. It’s now August, no response. I’ve called, emailed, nothing. Horrible customer service. Not worth the risk unless you know the exact pair. Always buy these in person.

originalText.text: I bought 3 pairs of golf pants from Dunning.  They come packaged so there is a permanent crease across both the thigh and calf of the pants.  Washing and ironing does no good due to the poor quality of the material.  Avoid buying these pants if you care about how you look.

text.text: I bought 3 pairs of golf pants from Dunning.  They come packaged so there is a permanent crease across both the thigh and calf of the pants.  Washing and ironing does no good due to the poor quality of the material.  Avoid buying these pants if you care about how you look.

originalText.text: Fellow Dunning here and unfortunately, very disappointed. I bought a shirt and it didn’t fit. Started an exchange for smaller size. Mailed the shirt back and got an email 2 weeks later stating they didn’t have it in my size so I would be refunded. They refunded all but $11 for shipping. Thank you for letting me try your shirt on for $11.
